data.comment: The first half has been concluded at Carrow Road.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Adam Clayton (Birmingham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Harlee Dean (Birmingham) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 55, Birmingham make their first substitution with Jeremie Bela replacing Jonathan Leko.
Daniel Farke is making the team's first substitution at Carrow Road with Adam Idah replacing Jordan Hugill.
Mario Vrancic is replacing Oliver Skipp for the home team.
In the minute 85, Daniel Farke (Norwich) is making a third substitution, with Przemyslaw Placheta replacing Teemu Pukki.
Adam Clayton in Birmingham has been yellow-carded a second time by Oliver Langford and is being sent off.
Norwich take a 1-0 lead thanks to Mario Vrancic.
In the minute 87, Adam Idah with an assist there.
Birmingham's George Friend has been booked in Norwich.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
At Carrow Road, Adam Idah has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ivan Sunjic (Birmingham) has received a first yellow card.
The away team replace Marc Roberts with Mikel San Jose.
